name: Survivor Legends
description:
hello. To all of you who are playing the game on Steam and visiting this page.

I am a newbie creator who started making games in February.

And to present my first work to you, I am a little nervous and happy at the same time.

If you can find even a little bit of fun while playing this game, I will be happy.

With all my heart, Reno Games.


Written with the help of Google Translator.
